name: cascading.vim
description:
A simple cascading indenter.


Cascading auto-break:

$var->foo->bar->short()->very_long_long_long( )->very_long_long_long_long( )

Press -- to convert line into

$var->foo->bar
    ->short()
    ->very_long_long_long( )
    ->very_long_long_long_long( )


Supported File Types

php
perl
ruby
